name: Blueprint Digger
description:
You are a drone trapped in a big cave after your starship crashed and you need to build a way to an exit. Your radar can still detect the teleport points hidden in each level but unfortunately your memory is damaged and you cannot choose witch blueprint you have access to.

In Adventure mode, you'll have to find the exit and build a path to it from what your memory allows you to build.

In puzzle mode, you'll see the exit and have to reach it with the limited number of blueprints allowed on each level.
